lines.text: Come on sweetheart. Let's see what you got.
What the fuck is wrong with you people? Why don't you leave us alone?
We're hungry.
You never heard of pizza?
[swings at Tex and misses]
I like liver...
[punches Benny]
and onions...
[strangles Benny]
and pain! And pain! And pain!
Time for dinner!

[lights lighter]
You're toast, fuck!

[after peeping on Michelle in the bathroom]
She likes it. She likes it just fine. Just ask her!
Why don't you just shut up, stupid.
You shut the fuck up, motherfucker. This is my place! I'll do whatever I want here in my place!
So, how do you like Texas?
Whaddaya think to our little lady?
...Uncertain. Looks like she might get all screamy on us Eddie.

[Slams meat cleaver on table]
I wish you'd call me Tex. I told you.
Oh I'm sorry boy. Goddamit, I'm sorry... how'd you like to do us the honor of plugging that whore up?
colored drawers.
California.
[after throwing body parts in a lake]
Is it soup yet?
Technology is our friend.
I'll be in hell for breakfast.
There's road kill all over Texas.
Sshh. This gun makes an awfully loud noise. And an awfully big hole.
Do I know you?
Shut up!
Look here Mister; I am very scared of guns, so please, do not point that at my face.
How many?
How many what, OJ?
How many sick bent-fucks like YOU are there out here?
Darlin' I only got one thing to say to you; I don't like the tone of your voice.
What is this? Booby traps? Camel netting? What are you people doin' out here?
Big suprise... FUCK YOU MISTER!
[Spits]

[Punches Alfredo into the bog]
One down.
I'm gonna service you real good babe.
It's Armageddon! It's Armageddon you bitch! Godammit!
Do you hear what I'm saying man? We're being hunted!
Junior loves them private parts. We knows what to do with them parts. Cut my own out years ago, I did.

[searching through a pit full of decomposing bodies]
I think I'm gonna barf.
Not in front of them news assholes. Far side of those trees.

[finding a pit full of decomposed bodies]
It's like them body pits we found up near Dong Tre... Just counting skulls, I'd say we're looking at 40 to 50 bodies here.
Jesus. This is fucked.

[singing to himself while dumping body parts into a lake]
Clean that trap Alfred, clean it good, all you motherfuckers don't tell me what I should... um, do. Take your ugly face Tex and ram it up your butt! *That's* what I'm gonna do!
[laughs]
Yeah, militant lumberjacks - I see 'em all the time.
